description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 8th June 2022 (RN: 21/07082/FULL) for the alterations to 6 Charles Street to include the erection of a single storey mansard roof extension and changes to the fenestration on Hays Mews elevation, partial demolition and rebuilding of 1 Hays Mews and amalgamation with 6 Charles Street; all to enlarge existing flats (Class C3). Creation of a courtyard at rear ground floor level of 1 Hays Mews and a terrace to the rear of 6 Charles Street at fifth floor level, installation of green roof areas to the main roof of 1 Hays Mews and the rear of 6 Charles Street at part fifth floor level. [SITE INCLUDES 1 HAY'S MEWS]. NAMELY, to allow external alterations to both Charles Street and Hays Mews elevations including replacement of entrance door and surround at 6 Charles Street, amendments to the window fenestration to mews internal lightwell, new rooflight and AOV vent; and internal alterations to apartment layouts. (Application under Section 73)
